definition: lit. to use one's bent arm as a pillow (idiom)/fig. content with simple things
triceps brachii (back of the upper arm)

sentences.english: When bending the elbow the triceps are the antagonist.
sentences.chinese: 屈臂時，肱三頭肌爲對抗肌。

sentences.english: The narrower your hands are placed, the more involved your triceps will be.
sentences.chinese: 雙手間距離越短，你的肱三頭肌會參與更多。

sentences.english: Closed traumatic disruption of the biceps brachii is an infrequent injury.
sentences.chinese: 外傷造成肱二頭肌封閉性的斷裂是一罕見的傷害。

sentences.english: When bending the elbow the biceps are the agonist.
sentences.chinese: 曲肘時，肱二頭肌會收縮。

sentences.english: The brachial artery runs from the shoulder to the elbow.
sentences.chinese: 肱動脈走行從肩部到肘部。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the manifestations of glenohumeral instability on CT arthrography.
sentences.chinese: 目的總結分析盂肱關節不穩在CT關節造影上的表現。

sentences.english: Conclusions There was a tendon plate in Biceps brachii of rabbit, muscle fibers arranged into ring-pennate shape.
sentences.chinese: 結論家兔肱二頭肌內有一腱板，肌束排列成環羽狀。

sentences.english: Objective To report the long-term outcome of brachialis muscle branch transfer.
sentences.chinese: 目的報道肌皮神經肱肌肌支移位後的遠期療效。

sentences.english: Brachial endothelium dependent relaxing function was detected by high resolution ultrasound.
sentences.chinese: 肱動脈內皮依賴性舒張功能測定用無創高分辨超聲法。

sentences.english: The triceps extend the elbows, straightening the arms.
sentences.chinese: 肱三頭肌使手肘伸展，伸直手臂。

definition: kneecapping/to cut or smash the kneecaps as corporal punishment
ilium/outermost bone of the pelvic girdle/Taiwan pr. [ka4]
